name: gotify
tagline: A self-hosted notification server for sending messages to devices
description: Gotify is a self-hosted notification server with WebSocket and REST APIs. Users can send alerts to mobile and desktop via apps or browser interface without relying on third-party notification providers.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Send real-time alerts to mobile and desktop devices without third-party services

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive instant notifications via WebSocket connections for real-time delivery

features.title: REST API
features.description: Simple HTTP API for sending messages from scripts, applications, and services

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Native Android app and web interface for receiving notifications on any device

features.title: Message Priority
features.description: Set priority levels to control notification behavior and display

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: View and search through notification history in the web interface

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete ownership of notification infrastructure without external dependencies
